problem.markdown:
>>1.To obtain the dryness fraction of steam from a throttling calorimeter, the steam after throttling calorimeter should be:<< (x) Dry and saturated ( ) Superheated ( ) Completely condensed ( ) Wet
>>2.In throttling process a. H12 = H2 b. H1 = H2 c. H1 = H2 + Hfg d.:<< ( ) H12 = H2 (x) H1 = H2 + Hfg ( ) H1 = H2 ( ) H1 = H2 - Hfg
>>3.Throttling calorimeter is used to measure the dryness fraction up to<< ( ) 0.98 ( ) 0.7 (x) 1.0 ( ) Anything
